title: bedpostx
description: Bayesian Estimation of Diffusion Parameters Obtained using Sampling Techniques (BEDPOST) for modeling multiple fibers per voxel.

subject_dir.title: Subject Directory
subject_dir.description: Input subject directory which contains bvals, bvecs, data, and nodif_brain_mask files.

ard_weight.title: ARD Weight
ard_weight.description: ARD weight, more weight means less secondary fibres per voxel (default 1).

model_type.title: Model Type
model_type.description: Deconvolution model. 1: with sticks, 2: with sticks with a range of diffusivities (default), 3: with zeppelins.

grad_nonlinear.title: Gradient Nonlinearities
grad_nonlinear.description: Consider gradient nonlinearities, expects grad_dev in the subject directory.
